text: Although lacking in academia compared to his brothers, Cao Zhang more than makes up for it with his martial prowess and wilful determination. By throwing himself into the fray and showing no signs of fear or hesitation even when surrounded by foes, he inspires his men to push beyond their limits.

Although lacking in academia compared to his brothers, Cao Zhang more than makes up for it with his martial prowess and wilful determination. By throwing himself into the fray and showing no signs of fear or hesitation even when surrounded by foes, he inspires his men to push beyond their limits.
A veteran of countless wars, Zang Ba's resolve is never shaken.
A veteran of countless wars, Zang Ba's resolve is never shaken.
It takes great practise and training to execute a false retreat, when done perfectly the very tides of battle can shift in one's favour.
It takes great practise and training to execute a false retreat, when done perfectly the very tides of battle can shift in one's favour.
With the ancestral spirits of Yue heroes of eld guiding her blade, Ouhou Cai devastates all in her wake!
With the ancestral spirits of Yue heroes of eld guiding her blade, Ouhou Cai devastates all in her wake!
Even if the will of the Heavens is fated, Jiang Wei's unshakable faith and fervour pushes his body beyond mortal boundaries.
Even if the will of the Heavens is fated, Jiang Wei's unshakable faith and fervour pushes his body beyond mortal boundaries.
Revenge is an act of passion. Vengeance is an act of justice. In memory of those who came before, both are one and the same.
Revenge is an act of passion. Vengeance is an act of justice. In memory of those who came before, both are one and the same.
A canny tactician, Xi Zhicai can read every movement his foe makes, and can toss them off-guard and off-balance with a few simple and unexpected manouvers.
A canny tactician, Xi Zhicai can read every movement his foe makes, and can toss them off-guard and off-balance with a few simple and unexpected manouvers.
Out of the darkness, Pan Lin swoops!
Out of the darkness, Pan Lin swoops!
A concoction of deadly poisons and potions, mixed in the swamps of Nanzhong, hurled right into some poor sap's eyes. Nasty.
A concoction of deadly poisons and potions, mixed in the swamps of Nanzhong, hurled right into some poor sap's eyes. Nasty.
With ever rising scorn, Wang Kuang revels in the misery of his foes, and is willing to commit unspeakable actions on the battlefield.
With ever rising scorn, Wang Kuang revels in the misery of his foes, and is willing to commit unspeakable actions on the battlefield.
Lifted by Fan Yufeng's optimistic words, her soldiers fight on with increased intensity.
Lifted by Fan Yufeng's optimistic words, her soldiers fight on with increased intensity.
Move it, you oafs! Fight harder!
Move it, you oafs! Fight harder!
Li Dian makes a well measured, calculated strike, aiming to cripple those he is engaged with.
Li Dian makes a well measured, calculated strike, aiming to cripple those he is engaged with.
Although his contemptuous words insult even his allies, Zhang Song can use them to practically goad those on his side to redirect their anger towards his foes.
Although his contemptuous words insult even his allies, Zhang Song can use them to practically goad those on his side to redirect their anger towards his foes.
As unrelenting as a southern typhoon, Yan Xia's uncompromising shots drives back all who oppose her.
As unrelenting as a southern typhoon, Yan Xia's uncompromising shots drives back all who oppose her.
As inspiring as the Goddess of the Luo River, Lady Zhen sings a heavenly song that causes passions to soar.
As inspiring as the Goddess of the Luo River, Lady Zhen sings a heavenly song that causes passions to soar.

Once Yang Xiu starts filibustering and waxing poetical, those who hear him cannot help but want to shut him up.

With lethal precision and timing, Zhao E's blade renders her hapless target asunder.
With lethal precision and timing, Zhao E's blade renders her hapless target asunder.
With thunderous energy, Zhang Ren cleaves the battlefield in twain!
With thunderous energy, Zhang Ren cleaves the battlefield in twain!

Even if the battle is lost, even if Heaven's will is unbreaking, even if all seems hopeless, Cao Ang will not flee, and will not surrender! Even as he feels his own blood gush away, he lashes out against the pain, bringing twofold suffering to his foes!

Halt, villainous rebels, and face the judgement of the Heavens!
Halt, villainous rebels, and face the judgement of the Heavens!

The tip of Gongsun Zan's spear can shatter even the most stalwart of defences!
The tip of Gongsun Zan's spear can shatter even the most stalwart of defences!
Yang Feng is first into the fray, and commands his men skilfully even when in the thick of things, encouraging his soldiers to press ever on.
